name: backend-frontend
description: Y is a Twitter (X) clone built for Web and Mobile Engineering (DIT342)

scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/whyDB VITE_API_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:3000/api npm run build --prefix client && cross-env NODE_ENV=production MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/whyDB VITE_API_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:3000/api npm run start --prefix server
